item.title: NASA: Stranded US Astronauts to Return to Earth Tuesday
item.description: A pair of U.S. astronauts stuck for more than nine months on the International Space Station will be returned to Earth on Tuesday evening, NASA said.

item.title: Bessent: Some Countries Offering to Drop Tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump's tariff plan already is working, as some U.S. trade partners "want to drop their tariffs," Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent sa...

item.title: IDF Strikes Hezbollah Site in Lebanon After Gunfire Into Israel
item.description: The Israel Defense Forces on Sunday struck a command-and-control center in Southern Lebanon used by Hezbollah's Radwan Force.

item.title: Israeli Hostage Negotiators Meet Egyptian Officials
